attributes.action: Break off all dealings with the USA unless they force Israel to obey UN Resolutions 242 and 338
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UN Resolutions 242 and 338 are orders for Israel to leave the occupied territories.  They blantantly ignore these UN resolutions with the full support of the US.  The 9/11 commission established that the main reason people resort to terrorism is the treatment of the Palestinians.
